title: PSA: Eve is getting the Victorious skin this year.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xH3bURhb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-06T01:03:47.238+0000)
>
> Lol thats shadow eve

Shhh!

You're ruining my troll.
it does look like a victorious skin tho so 10/10 meme

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xH3bURhb,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-10-06T02:37:58.135+0000)
>
> it does look like a victorious skin tho so 10/10 meme

You have no idea how many people I have fooled.

Because there's totally logic there right.

The Victorious skins are given to champions that had the biggest impact on the meta of that season.

Man, what an impact Evelynn had this year, the Jungle was defined by her.
Oh wait that was Ivern the Tree Pedophile.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xH3bURhb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-06T04:42:55.397+0000)
>
> Because there's totally logic there right.
> 
> The Victorious skins are given to champions that had the biggest impact on the meta of that season.
> 
> Man, what an impact Evelynn had this year, the Jungle was defined by her.
> Oh wait that was Ivern the Tree Pedophile.

You got baited and you're wrong.

If that was the case, Lee would have got the jungle skin, but he didn't. Sit down, preferably away from me, with your bronze knowledge.

Aw man you're a lower Rank than I am! :o


No, Lee would have gotten the Victorious skin years ago if he was ever going to get it.
While he may be the number one jungler each season (or at least in the number one position for a significant time each season), he has NEVER impacted an entire meta.

While this year in Plat and higher if you wanted to win as a jungler you played either Graves or Ivern. If you wanna know more there are plenty of multi-season challenger jungle mains who've been salty at Riot for forcing this upon them all year. (almost as bad as the ADC rework)
Thank fuck the skin wasn't given to Ivern.

As for being baited, if I was baited I would be believing you that the Shadow Evelynn splash is the victorious skin reveal, which btw you did at the worst possible time since we already got the teaser.

[Oh look, it's Graves!](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3uhYG6DkjiI/WdfcwqJXwRI/AAAAAAAAwxM/yDlsRixcTtAoN9-4evJwY0uHstPgdhFUgCLcBGAs/s1600/22228201_1747512031947993_3642781375677130572_n.jpg)
